title: Bunkhouse Barn Interiors
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Book and gifts shop with a small coffee shop inside. Menu has marked vegetarian options, of which you could modify to be vegan: trailblazer salad (berries, quinoa, spinach omit feta and candied almonds); muzzleloader (kale, cabbage, sprouts, peppers, carrots, cashews, peanuts, wasabi peas with sesame dressing); and wild west corn salad (corn, black beans, peppers on greens). Note that these salads are seasonal and might change. Has soy milk, almond milk, coconut milk for drinks.
